backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user, business, customer, item, invoice, and GST filing status types with storage maps and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with safe‑area utilities.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, manifest link, icons, and extensive iOS splash‑screen declarations.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, icons, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Defines a service worker that caches static assets, cleans old caches, and serves assets via network-first or cache-first strategies.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST.md: Manual smoke‑test checklist covering authentication, admin panel, and core user flows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app with React Query, routing, theming, service worker registration, and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddUserDia: A form dialog for admins to create new users with email, password, mobile number, role, and optional access expiry.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Admin-only login form that authenticates via user ID and password without Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOnlyG: Gate component that checks admin status and shows loading or access-denied screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPorta: Layout wrapper for admin pages with a title bar and optional back button.
frontend/src/components/admin/SetAccessU: Dialog allowing admins to set or clear a user's access expiry date and submit it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/admin/UsersTable: Displays all users with actions for deleting, viewing dashboards, and updating access expiry, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessGate.ts: A no-op wrapper component that simply renders its children for version 9 compatibility.
frontend/src/components/AppAccessLoginFo: Legacy access login UI retained for compatibility but instructs users to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary that catches render errors and displays an error fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the main app layout including header, navigation, footer, and PWA install section.
frontend/src/components/auth/CredentialS: A sign-in form that handles email/password authentication with client-side validation and mutation-driven error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignUpDialo: A dialog-based sign-up form with validation, success messaging, and mutation handling for creating new user accounts.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles authentication flow using Internet Identity or credentials and shows a sign‑in UI when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/customers/Custom: A dialog for adding or editing customers that manages form state, validation, and save mutations with success/error feedback.
A customer listing table with loading/empty states and actions for editing and deleting entries using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ErrorFallbackScr: Displays a fallback error screen with reload and optional sign‑in actions when the app encounters an error.
frontend/src/components/FirstAdminSetupD: Empty placeholder file for first‑admin setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/forms/Scrollable: A wrapper around SelectContent that enforces a scrollable, iOS-friendly dropdown container.
frontend/src/components/gst/GstProfileSe: A GST profile display component showing GSTIN, status, and related registration details with conditional rendering.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Invoice: Provides a table UI to add, edit, and remove invoice line items, updating quantities, rates, discounts, and item selection.
Displays a badge showing whether an invoice is Draft or Finalized.
frontend/src/components/invoices/Monthly: Calculates and displays monthly invoice totals, GST breakdowns, and counts with optional month/year filtering.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing an item with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/items/ItemsTable: Renders a table of items with edit and delete actions, handling confirmation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button that handles Internet Identity auth, caching cleanup, and sign‑in recording.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Mobile navigation drawer with links to main app sections.
frontend/src/components/PrintLayout.tsx: Minimal authenticated layout for print views that includes profile setup but no app shell.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new users for their name and saves it using profile APIs, showing a dialog only when no profile exists.
frontend/src/components/pwa/IosInstallHe: Dialog showing step‑by‑step instructions for installing the PWA on iOS home screens.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallFo: Footer section offering Android and iOS PWA installation options and handling installation prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCredentialSig: Provides admin-only credential-based sign‑in using the current actor and refreshes admin status on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUserDashboard: Fetches admin-only user invoice KPIs and derives user details from the user list.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminUsers.ts: Admin hooks to list, create, delete, and update users, automatically invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCredentialSignIn.t: Performs user credential sign‑in with automatic Internet Identity login and retries until an authenticated actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Gets and saves the current authenticated user's profile, handling actor-dependent loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading stored identities, handling login/clear, and exposing identity status.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks whether the current user is an admin and exposes loading and fetched states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrintOnce.ts: Triggers window.print once when ready and optionally runs a callback after printing.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Detects PWA installability, handles install prompts, and tracks install state including iOS behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, business profiles, customers, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordInternetIden: Provides a hook that waits for an actor to become available and records an Internet Identity sign-in event safely.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeInternetIdenti: Wraps Internet Identity login with automatic retry logic for stale sessions and exposes login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignUp.ts: Defines a sign-up mutation that calls the backend actor to create new user credentials.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles, theme variables, safe-area support, mobile touch improvements, and print rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders admin authentication flow and, if authorized, displays the admin panel with user management tools.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserDashboardPag: Shows admin-only user details and KPI metrics with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CustomersPage.tsx: Displays and manages the customer list with search, editing, and add-customer dialog.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Presents invoice, customer, and item KPIs, plus business profile checks and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/GstFilingStatusPage.t: UI page for viewing GST filing status, allowing GSTIN editing, FY/return-type selection, and fetching filtered filing data.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays full invoice details with actions to finalize, delete, or print, loading related customer and item data.
frontend/src/pages/InvoiceEditorPage.tsx: Form page for creating or editing invoices, managing customers, items, line items, and saving changes.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicePrintPage.tsx: Generates a print-friendly invoice layout, loading all required data and triggering printing when ready.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicesPage.tsx: Lists invoices with status and date filters, showing customer names and allowing navigation to invoice details.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsPage.tsx: Manages items with search, listing, and create/edit dialog support, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders a settings form for managing business profile details and logo upload with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates, and logs installation or errors.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's full route hierarchy including layouts, pages, and admin routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/utils/adminTimeFormat.ts: Formats backend bigint nanosecond timestamps into readable date/time strings and converts Date objects back to backend format.
frontend/src/utils/appAccessStorage.ts: Provides deprecated helpers for storing and clearing app access flags in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormat.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and extracting parts of invoice dates.
frontend/src/utils/financialYears.ts: Generates the past five Indian financial year strings based on the current date.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formats numbers into INR currency using locale rules.
frontend/src/utils/gstCalculations.ts: Computes invoice totals including GST components and provides helpers to format currency and calculate from invoice data.
frontend/src/utils/gstFilingStatusDispla: Normalizes GST filing status strings into consistent labels and returns UI badge variants.
frontend/src/utils/indianStates.ts: Exports a constant list of all Indian states and territories.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceNumbering.ts: Generates formatted invoice numbers based on business profile prefix and starting number.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceRules.ts: Defines rules for whether an invoice can be deleted and provides related error messages.
frontend/src/utils/passwordHash.ts: Empty placeholder for password hashing utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Provides a utility to convert various error types into clean, user-friendly messages with normalization and specific error-case handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the GST Pro app.
